data.text:
@HzBrandenburg I now only pay attention to the (Scottish) number of those hospitalised with covid.

This is the only accurate number available - and it is going up.

Of that limited number of tests still conducted, over 20% are positive. Which is a lot higher than a month or two ago. Could be because only those who feel possibly symptomatic are doing it. Or because it has been spreading massively again. Or somewhere in between.
@HzBrandenburg If you do no tests then you have no cases, technically speaking
